analysis.description: Moderated.isContract (/unique_chucks/25/0xdc5d6be5517c347f53ca2bec05537490f820c65d.sol#96-102) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0xdc5d6be5517c347f53ca2bec05537490f820c65d.sol:

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0xdc5d6be5517c347f53ca2bec05537490f820c65d.sol:
